titleStmt.title: The charter of the city of New-York
Charter (1686)
titleStmt.author: New York (N.Y.).

titleStmt.title: The charter of the city of New-York
Charter (1686)
titleStmt.author: New York (N.Y.).
Limerick, Thomas Dongan, Earl of, 1634-1715.

notesStmt.note: Charter granted by Governor Thomas Dongan; the charter, which became known as Dongan's Charter, was virtually effective on Dec. 10, 1683, although it did not receive official seal of the province until Apr. 27, 1686. Cf. Encyc. Amer., 1977, v. 20, p. 237.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
